title: Political Theater: Katy Tur & Anita Kumar Plus Peter Marks
description: Katy Tur and Politico's Anita Kumar join Chuck Todd to talk about the fourth Democratic debate and the impeachment inquiry. Washington Post theater critic Peter Marks provides fresh perspective on the debate performance.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
